title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 2053.9 - Amendment of records
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 2053.9 - Amendment of records

State Regulations
(a) Within 30
business days of receipt of a written request from a data subject for
correction or amendment of a record or personal information, reasonably
described, pertaining to that data subject, which he or she believes is not
accurate, relevant, timely, or complete, the corporation shall: (1)
make the amendment or correction in whole
or in part and inform the data subject that, on request, such correction or
amendment will be provided to any person or governmental unit to which the
record or personal information has been or is disclosed pursuant to section
2053.4
(a)(4), (9) or
(12)
of this Part; or
(2)
inform the data subject in writing of its
refusal to correct or amend the record, including the reasons
therefor. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
2053.9

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
